name: bnomei/kirby3-dotenv
description: Kirby 3 Plugin for environment variables from .env

suggest.bnomei/kirby3-lapse: For faster and automatic caching based on modification of Kirby Objects
suggest.bnomei/kirby3-janitor: Use a Panel Button or PHP code to clear the cache
suggest.bnomei/kirby3-security-headers: CPS headers to make the the web a saver place. Sensible defaults with zero configuration.
suggest.robinscholz/better-rest: Allows you to send authenticated GET requests querying the Kirby API
